content: I believe this is often a previously inserted comment in some email (most ads) from those whose main message is dependent on HTML. Since Thunderbird works fine with HTML, there should be no problem. Or am I missing something? Thank you.
creator: davidsk

content: David: Many thanks for your reply. Somehow, I have botched up the settings for my received e-mail messages. Prior to my fumbling around with the settings, the messages I received appeared with HTML images appearing when I opened the message. Now, however, only text appears when the message is opened. I need to know which setting I need to re-set and how I get to that particular setting. Thanks, again, for your help, and if you can help me find that setting, I will greatly appreciate it. Tom.
creator: TomWilliams231

content: Puoi aggiungere il codice della firma? (come screenshot o hostando il file di testo su qualche servizio esterno) Rimuovi eventuali dati privati.
creator: @next

content: Se vuoi ordinare per data fai click sulla colonna Data (uno o due volte a seconda se vuoi l'ordine crescente o decrescente). Assicurati inoltre di aver disattivato la vista discussioni -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/thunderbird-messaggi-raggruppati-discussione
creator: @next
